isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - AIR SYSTEM - ROADRANGER VALVE A-5013

figure.caption: Figure 7. Roadranger Valve A-5013 Exploded View

step1.para: Remove two screws holding the bottom cover to the valve and slide the cover down the gear shift lever to expose the air line fittings.
Loosen the jam nut and turn the control valve from the gear shift lever.
Pry the medallion from the recess in the top cover.
Remove the two screws to separate the top cover from the valve housing.
Remove the two screws on the side of valve housing to separate the housing.
Remove the Range Preselection Lever from the housing and the position balls and guide from lever.
If necessary, remove the spring and O-ring from bores in left housing.
If necessary, remove the springs, O-ring and sleeve from bores in the housing.

Refer to Figure 7 for proper reassembly. Use a VERY SMALL amount of silicone lubricant on the O-rings to avoid clogging ports. A small amount of grease on the position springs and balls will help to hold them in place during reassembly.
Install control valve on gear shift lever and tighten jam nut.
Attach air lines and install bottom cover.
